overview: Richard Meade is founder and COO of Amartus with over 18 years experience in the software industry. Before this he worked with both Michael & Maurizio in Marconi Communications, where he was Engineering Manager for their multi-service network management solution. He arrived at this position after a number of years producing telecoms management solutions, working with clients from analysis right through to delivery. Richard graduated from University College Dublin in 1992 with a BSc (Joint Hons) in Mathematics & Computer Science
